elevate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to move someone or something to a more important level or rank, or make them better than before
elevate.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Language has elevated humans above the other animals.
Their purpose is to elevate AIDS to the top of government priorities.
elevate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to lift someone or something to a higher position
elevate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Gradually elevate the patient into an upright position.
elevate.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to increase the amount, temperature, pressure etc of something
elevate.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: These drugs may elevate acid levels in the blood.
